headline.main: Russian Opposition Leader Says He Was Attacked on the Stump by Cossacks

docs.snippet: Ms. Sharmila had been force-fed through a tube in her nose while protesting a law shielding members of the military from prosecution. She now plans to run for office....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ms. Sharmila had been force-fed through a tube in her nose while protesting a law shielding members of the military from prosecution. She now plans to run for office.
docs.abstract: Indian activist Irom Chanu Sharmila ends nearly 16-year hunger strike against Armed Forces Special Powers Act of 1958, law that protects members of military from prosecution in conflict-ridden parts of India; declares intention to run for office in her home state of Manipur after being released on bail.

headline.main: Indian Activist, Irom Chanu Sharmila, Ends Nearly 16-Year Hunger Strike
headline.print_headline: Indian Activist Ends Her Hunger Strike
